profile.title: Profayilo y’Omukozesa
profile.noPrivateKey: Tewali kisumuluzo ky’ekyama ku kifaananyi kino kya ekiyuma ky’ono okuky’exportinga.
profile.importSuccess: Kisumuluzo ky’ekyama kiyingiziddwa ku ktya kya kuyiya kino.
profile.importFailed: Okuyingiza kisumuluzo kugaanye (akasumuluzo kakaafu oba fayiro eyononeka).
profile.keysRotated: Kisumuluzo ekipya kyakolebwa ne public key etteekeddwa waggulu.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Kisumuluzo kyo ky’ekyama tekiva ku kiyuma kyo. Fulumya koppi ekozesebwa ku kuuma (password-protected) osobole okugizza ku kiyuma ekirala.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Oli ku Free—kozesa Sun/Moon wano wansi. Yimirira (Upgrade) ofune emmeeza mu bungi.
profile.backupDesc: Kola kopi ez’Ekisumuluzo ezinamiddwa akasumuluzo, era ozisobole okuzzayo ku kiyuma ekirala okuzikwataganya.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Ziba bwe pulogulamu tebeera mu maaso
profile.followHint: Ebyafaayo byabwe bijjanga mu Following bwoba oba bawadde Followers (oba Public).
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Sindikira okuyita n’obubaka obuyingira ku ssimu yo oba email eyakiriziddwa. Okuyita/obubaka obuva gy’oli buyinza kulaga ennamba ya Chatforia.
profile.errE164: Tekamu ennamba ya ssimu entuufu mu E.164 (ok. +15551234567).
profile.errSmsDest: Londako ekimu ku ebigendererwa (ssimu oba email).
profile.errQuietHours: Quiet hours zirina okuba wakati wa 0 ne 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Londa obubaka oba ekisenge ky’okuyita okutandika

status.filesNote: Okutuuka ku fayiro 5. Ekomerera mu ssaawa 24 bulijjo.

auth.headline: Obubaka obukuume, obw’ensi yonna n’okutoloolwa amangu ddala
auth.description: End-to-end encryption, AI okuttoloola, obubaka obuzikirira, n’okuyita n’okuwulira eddoboozi/vidiyo.

feature.encryption: Okukuuma okuva ku ntandikwa okutuuka ku nkomerero
feature.privacy: Eby’ekyama mu maaso. Ebibyo, obufuzi bwo.

auth.desktopTip: Ku kompyuta? Scan n’Essimu ofune app.
auth.tip: Osobola okukozesa Chatforia ku byuma byonna — oba okussaako app okufuna obumanyirivu obusinga.
auth.scanHint: Scan ofune app oba obikkule mu browser.

press.title: Eby’amawulire
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia y’omubaka omukuumi okuva ku nkomerero okutuuka ku nkomerero n’okutoloolwa amangu, eyakolebwa okutambuza okunyumya okw’ensi yonna nga kwa kyama era kulungi.

careers.title: Emirimu
careers.intro: Tuli ttiimu entono ezimba omubaka ogw’ensi yonna ogw’ekyama. Bw’okyagala encryption, okuyamba abakozesa, n’UX ennungi, twandikwagadde okuwulira ku ggwe.
careers.openRoles: Emirimu giriko: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.

about.title: Ebya Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ye messenger omukuumi, ow’olulimi lungi ennyo, ng’alina end-to-end encryption, okutoloolwa amangu, n’okuyita/vidiyo. Okusinziira ku misomo gyaffe: okuyamba abantu okweggatta—nga batese, mu kyama, era nga bayita mu nnimi zonna.

values.privacy: Kyama mu maaso: E2E encryption by default.
values.control: Obufuzi: Obubaka obuzikirira & eby’okulaba nti basomye bya kyenkanyi.

about.howDescription: Obubaka bukuumibwa ku kiyuma kyo nga tebunnavaayo. Okutoloolwa, kopi, n’okukwataganya byakolebwa okwewala ebyo ebisobola okulabibwa ku seva.

advertise.title: Weereza eby’amawulire ne Chatforia
advertise.description: Tuukirira abakozesa b’obubaka mu ngeri ennyonjo, ey’kitiibwa. Tulina banner mu bifo ebilabika, sponsorships, n’ebitundu ebya maka. Abasasula Premium tebabalaba bigula.

adsense.withPubId: Kati tuteeka eby’amawulire okuyita mu Google AdSense. Bw’oyagala okutukirira okuyita mu Google Ads, kozesa publisher ID {{pubId}} era osabe managed placement ku mmotoka zaffe wansi. Sponsorships ez’okusika ziriwo—kozesamu fomu.
adsense.noPubId: Kati tuteeka eby’amawulire okuyita mu Google AdSense. Sponsorships ez’okusika nazo ziriwo—kozesamu fomu wansi.

advertise.noPlacements: Tewali bifo biterekeddwa. Biyingize mu ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Okuddamu okulambula n’ebbanga eddene mu chat UI
why.sponsoredMoments: Sponsored moments (ok. “Start a Chat” modal) ziriyo
why.deals: Endagaano ez’entambula oba programmatic okuyita mu AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Webale! Okubuuza kwo kutuukiridde. Tugenda kuddamu mu bwangu.
form.successToast: Webale! Tugenda kubeera ku mikono mangu.
form.mailtoInfo: Tuggulawo email client gy’okolera okuzuula okubuuzako…

upgrade.title: Yimirira (Upgrade)
upgrade.subtitle: Londako pulaani entuufu: ggyamu ebiragiro n’Plus, oba funa eby’obusobozi byonna ne Premium.

gettingStarted.title: Okutandika
gettingStarted.subtitle: Omuyambi omumpi ogulaga by’omu ngeri empya okubeera omukozi mu ddakiika ntono.

alert.text: Omuyambi guno gunaayongerwako nga tutojjayo ebirungi bipya. Bw’olaba ekibulamu, tuwandiikire okuyita ku

section2.title: 2) Tandika okunyumya
section2.item1: Kola DM oba Group otume obubaka bwo obusooka.
section2.item3: Gezaako obubaka obuzikirira n’ebyalaba nti basomye mu Profayilo → Privacy.

section3.title: 3) Genda mu maaso
section3.item1Part2: omuko (Plus = nga tewali by’amawulire, Premium = by’obusobozi byonna).
section3.item2Part1: Gattako ebyuma ebirala era oteeke kopi mu

account.a: Wannula app oba kozesa web, koona ku “Kola akawunti”, kakasa email/ssimu. Okuliggya, kozesa “Wewerabidde akasumuluzo”.

privacy.q: Obubaka bukuumibwa okuva ku ntandikwa okutuuka ku nkomerero?
privacy.a: Yee. Obubaka n’okuyita bikumibwa E2E bulijjo. Ggwe n’oyogeddeko mwe musinga okubusoma.

translate.a: Kiyingize “Auto-translate” mu Settings → Appearance & Language. Ttolooza ku kiyuma we kisoboka, oba okuyita mu APIs ez’akakuuma n’eby’obubaka bitono.

contact.a: Tusindikire ku support@chatforia.com. Okwongerako screenshots n’enkola ya app gy’okozesa.

contact.title: Tukwatagane
contact.errorSend: Tekisobodde okugenda. Bambi wandiika email ku support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Ettemu lino lijjukira engeri Chatforia (“ffe”, “ffe wamu”) gy’etuukiriza, eky’osomesa, n’okugabana amawulire bw’okolera ku nteekateeka zaffe. Tuzimba Chatforia okutono okusinga byonna bye tusobola okulaba.

infoWeCollect.title: Ebifa ku kumanya kwe tukungaanya
infoWeCollect.account: Amakulu g’akawunti (ok. email/ssimu) okukola n’okukuuma akawunti yo.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Ebirimu ebikuumiddwa (obubaka/okuyita) bikumiddwa E2E; tetusobola kubisoma.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Eby’okulondoola/okukozesa nga crash logs, ekika ky’eki yuma, oba analytics entono okuweereza enkola.

sharing.title: Okugabana
sharing.body: Tetutunda bifa ku bantu. Tuyinza okugabana obutono n’abo abatusaidde mu kukola (ok. push, analytics) nga waliwo endagaano ez’amaanyi.

rights.title: Obuyinza bwo
rights.body: Okusinziira ku kitundu kyo (ok. GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), osobola okusaba okuzuula, okuddamu, okusangula, oba okuvamu emirimu gimu. Tuukirira: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Okutereka & Obukuumi
retention.body: Tutereka ebyetaagisa byokka okuddukanya obuweereza era tukozesa obukuumi obw’ensi yonna. E2E ebirimu tetusobola kubivumbula.

children.title: Abaana
children.body: Chatforia tetekeddwa ku baana abali wansi w’emyaka 13 (oba nga amateeka go bwe galagira).

changes.title: Enkyukakyuka
changes.body: Tujja kuteka wano ebya waggulu n’okwongera ku “Lyatuukirizibwa ku” ennaku.

intro.body: Bw’okolera ku Chatforia okkiriza amateeka gano. Bw’otakkiriza, tokozese obuweereza.

accounts.title: Akawunti
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Wa obubaka obutuufu era okume akasumuluzo mu ngeri ey’obukuumi.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Ggwe asingayo obuvunaanyizibwa ku kyo kyonna ekikolwa ku akawunti yo.

acceptableUse.title: Enkozesa entuufu
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Tewali biragiro eby’obumenyi bw’amateeka, obukambwe, oba obuseegu; tewali spam oba okubookoza okutambulira mu byuma.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Tuyinza okuggya oba okuziyiza singa wamenya amateeka.

yourContent.title: Ebirimu byo
yourContent.body: Okwesigika kwebiri by’ebyo. Otuwa obuyinza obwetaagisa okutambuza obuweereza (ok. okuwereza, okutereka, okutoloolwa).

disclaimer.title: Okugaanira & Obuvunaanyizibwa
disclaimer.body: Obuweereza buweebwa “nga bwe buli” nga tewali by’okusuubira. Okutuuka we kikkirizibwa amateeka, Chatforia teefuuka na bubi bwonna obuvuddemu mu ngeri etewali y’obufuzi.

changes.title: Enkyukakyuka
changes.body: Tuyinza okutereeza amateeka gano; okweyongerayo oluvannyuma lw’enkyukakyuka kitegeeza okukkiriza.

doNotSell.title: Totunda oba Tosasanye bifa ku Nze
doNotSell.body: Chatforia tetutunda bifa ku bantu. Abatuuze ba California basobola n’obudde okuteeka okusaba okusinziira ku CPRA wansi w’akakopi kano.

cookies.title: Entegeka za Cookie
cookies.body: Chatforia ekolanga ku cookie ntono (ok. session, security). Tetukozesa cookie za by’amawulire ebya bantu abalala. Fuga cookie okuyita mu by’entegeka bya browser.

phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Tewali nnamba eyaweebwa. Londa mu nnamba za area code okutandika okusindikira obubaka.

startChatModal.title: Tandika okunyumya
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Wandiika erinnya, username, ssimu, oba email…
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Wandiika username oba ssimu olyoke onoonye.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Ennamba/Email eno ejja kulabika bw’ogiteeka mu bakontakit.

sounds.freeNotice: Oli ku Free — ebidoboozi bya premium birabika naye biggaddwawo. Yimirira ofune byonna.

aiSettings.title: Entegeka za AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Fuga okutoloolwa, okuddamu okulambuzi, ne ForiaBot auto-responses.
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Sindikira AI obubaka obusembayo (bwe bitukakkana) okufuna okuddamu okutono.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Kisa ebigambo eby’obuseegu mu by’aloosesebwa bya AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Bw’ekyali, ebiddayo bya AI bijja kufuulibwa nga ebigambo ebibadde bikoleddwa bifumbiddwa

accessibilitySettings.title: Okuyamba & Obulabula
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Ebyokuyamba okukozesa Chatforia nga toyetaga ddoboozi.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Empya etandika nga ya bulijjo. Ginyweeze singa weetaaga ebigambo binene mu byokuyamba.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Obulabula obulabika ku bubaka & okuyita
Laga bannera n’okunyonyola mu title okulabula.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Kunyenyeza ku bubaka obupya (bwe busoboka)
Kozesa kunyenyeza kw’eki yuma mu bulabula.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Kunyooka ku kkanisa ku kuyita okuyingira
Okunyooka okutono nga okuyita kuyingira.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Wandikako mu buwandiike ebubaka eby’eddoboozi
Gatako transcript ku ddoboozi ly’ofunye.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Laga bannera n’okunyonyola mu title okulabula.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Kozesa kunyenyeza kw’eki yuma mu bulabula.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Kunyooka ku kkanisa ku kuyita okuyingira

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Tereka ciphertext yokka ku seva. Kijjako AI/Translate ne previews z’okusunsula.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Noonya ku erinnya, alias, username, oba ssimu
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Gaba link yo ey’okweyita okutandika amangu okunyumya.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Sigala ku mukutu nga okozesa Chatforia ku iOS ne Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Akategeeza: Obubaka bwo busigala bukwataganye wakati wa web ne mobile.

randomChat.title: Random Chat
randomChat.description: Sisimuka n’omuntu omupya amangu. Tujja kukulonda no ku ggatta mu kisenge eky’akaseera.
randomChat.saveGuard: Ebinyumya bya muntu-ku-muntu byokka bye bisobola okuterekebwa
